Sushmita Sen Height | Age | Boyfriend | Daughters | Biography | Wiki

Bolly Reporter
3 weeks ago

Sushmita Sen is an Indian film actress and model. Furthermore, at the age of 18, she crowned Femina Miss India in 1994 and Miss Universe 1994. In addition, she is the first Indian woman to win the competition. She also works in many Hindi, Tamil and Bengali movies.

Biography & Wiki

Sushmita Sen’s nicknames are Sush and Titu. She was born on 19 November 1975 in Hyderabad, Telangana, India in a Hindu Bengali family. Hence, her current age is 44 years. Sushmita’s Zodiac is Scorpio.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Family Members

Sushmita’s father is Shubeer Sen who is a former Indian Air Force Wing Commander. Her mother’s name is Subhra Sen who is a Jewelry Designer. Subhra sen is an owner of the Dubai based store. She also has a younger brother named Rajeev Sen.

Sushmita Sen adopted two baby girls, Renee and Alisah in 2010.

Boys, affairs, spouse name

There was a rumor that Sushmita had an affair with director Vikram Bhatt. Although, Vikram Bhatt was already married at that time and even had a child.

Apart from Vikram Bhatt, she has been in a relationship with Businessman Sanjay Narang and Entrepreneur Sabeer Bhatia. Furthermore, Sabeer is the head of hotmail.com. There was a buzz that, Sabeer Bhatia gave her a diamond ring of 10.5 carats.

Other than that, Sushmita had relationships with Randeep Hooda (Actor), Imtiaz Khatri (Businessman), Manav Menon (Ad-filmmaker), Bunty Sachdeva (Businessman), Mudassar Aziz (Director), Wasim Akram (Cricketer), Ritik Bhasin (Businessman).

Sushmita Sen currently in a serious relationship with Fashion model Rohman Shawl.

Education and School, College

As her father worked in IAF and transferred many places in India, Sushmita Sen changed her school many times. Firstly, she started her schooling from Air Force Golden Jubilee Institute, Delhi, India. After that, she joined Air Force Silver School, Delhi. Finally, she completed her schooling from St. Anns’s High School, Secunderabad, Hyderabad (Now in Telangana). She is also a Graduate in English Honors and Journalism.

Favorites Things and Like & Dislike

Sushmita Sen filmography

In 1994, as a teenager, Sen participated in the Femina Miss India contest. She won the title ‘Femina Miss India Universe‘, earning the right to compete at the Miss Universe 1994 contest. At the Miss Universe contest, Susmita ranked third overall in the preliminaries, behind Miss Colombia Carolina Gómez and Miss Venezuela Minorka Mercado. Sen went on to place second, fifth and third in the subsequent rounds and finally won the title and crown of Miss Universe 1994. She was the first Indian to win the title.

In 1996, Sushmita Sen started made her acting debut through Dastak. After that, she has been featured in many films such as Sirf Tum (1999), Biwi No. 1. Also, In 1999 Biwi no. 1 was the second-highest-grossing movie.

In 2000 she received critical acclaim and box office success for the film Aankhen, starring opposite Arjun Rampal. The film co-starred Amitabh Bachchan, Akshay Kumar, Aditya Pancholi, and Paresh Rawal. So far, her biggest hit has been the 2004 movie Main Hoon Na, in which she starred as Shahrukh Khan’s love interest. Moreover, the film grossed a total of Rs 330,000,000 and was the second best selling movie of that year.

In 2015, she starred in a Bengali drama film titled Nirbaak.

Awards & Recognitions

  • Sushmita won the title Femina Miss India Universe and Miss Universe in 1994.
  • Also, She won a Filmfare Award for Best supporting actress for her role in Bibi No.1 in 2000.
  • In 2006, Sen received the Rajiv Gandhi Award for her contribution to Cinema.
  • In 2013, she won the Mother Teresa Award for her work towards the society.
  • Furthermore, she has received the IIFA Award, 2 Filmfare Awards, 3 Star Screen Awards, and 3 Zee Cine Awards.

Salary and Net Worth

Sushmita Sen’s earns almost is ₹2 crores for every movie she plays. Her estimated net worth of almost $25 Million.

Contact Address

Controversies

  • In 1994, after she won the Miss India crown, Aishwarya Rai went backstage and broke down.
  • In 2012, she was robbed in Athens, Greece, she lost her passport, credit cards and other documents at the airport, which made it difficult for her to prove her identity.

Facts about Sushmita Sen

  • During her childhood, she was tomboyish as he spends the majority of her time with boys.
  • She’s the brand ambassador of big brands like Kalyan Jewellers and Assotech.
  • Sushmita was also associated with P&G’s Project Shiksha, which works on the development of children in need across the globe.
  • She loves animals and owns 4 dogs and a python.
  • It is said that the film “Ankahee” of 2006, was very much inspired by the relationship between her and director Vikram Bhatt.
  • In 1994, she was crowned as Miss Universe.
  • She is a fitness freak.
  • Her mother along with the Meena Bazaar’s tailor were the ones who made the gown that she wore at the finale of the Miss Universe.
  • Till the age of 16, she was not at all good in English, but she became fluent in it after a few years.
  • In January 2017, she became a judge of the Miss Universe 2016 beauty pageant held in Manila, Philippines.
